body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Nicholas Powell and the customer's name is Laura Gonzales.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Nicholas Powell. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Nicholas. I'm Laura Gonzales, and I'm feeling a bit frustrated because I can't find the right motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Laura. Let's see how we can help you find the perfect bike. What kind of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m looking for something that’s good for both commuting and leisure rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds great! We have a variety of models that fit that description. Just to get started, could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven zero two one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Laura. And could you also share your email address so I can send you more information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's laura.gonzales at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for that. I will ensure you receive all the details you need. Remember, we have a fantastic selection of bikes available.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Nicholas. I hope I can find the right one soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Laura! Thank you for your time today, and I'm here if you have any more questions. Have a wonderful day!
